import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Star, Users } from 'lucide-react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { officialsAPI } from '../services/api'; const Homepage = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [officials, setOfficials] = useState([]); const [searchQuery, setSearchQuery] = useState(''); const [filterParty, setFilterParty] = useState('all'); const [filterScore, setFilterScore] = useState('all'); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); useEffect(() => { fetchOfficials(); }, []); const fetchOfficials = async () => { try { setLoading(true); const response = await officialsAPI.getAll(); // Use mock data if API doesn't return data const mockOfficials = [ { id: 1, name: "Priya Reddy", position: "MLA", party: "Indian National Congress", constituency: "Bangalore South", tenure: "2018–Present", score: 87, image: "https://api.dicebear.com/7.x/avataaars/svg?seed=Priya", approvals: 2847, disapprovals: 423, promises: 24, completed: 18, inProgress: 4, broken: 2, lastUpdated: "2 hours ago", sources: { myneta: true, eci: true, twitter: true, news: 15, govt: 8 }, discussions: 156 }, { id: 2, name: "Anil Kumar", position: "Mayor", party: "BJP", constituency: "BBMP Ward 42", tenure: "2020–Present", score: 68, image: "https://api.dicebear.com/7.x/avataaars/svg?seed=Anil", approvals: 1823, disapprovals: 891, promises: 18, completed: 10, inProgress: 5, broken: 3, lastUpdated: "1 day ago", sources: { myneta: true, eci: true, twitter: true, news: 12, govt: 6 }, discussions: 89 }, { id: 3, name: "Meena Raj", position: "Urban Development Minister", party: "JD(S)", constituency: "Bangalore Central", tenure: "2019–Present", score: 82, image: "https://api.dicebear.com/7.x/avataaars/svg?seed=Meena", approvals: 3201, disapprovals: 567, promises: 31, completed: 22, inProgress: 7, broken: 2, lastUpdated: "5 hours ago", sources: { myneta: true, eci: true, twitter: true, news: 21, govt: 14 }, discussions: 203 } ]; setOfficials(response.data?.length > 0 ? response.data : mockOfficials); } catch (error) { console.error('Error fetching officials:', error); // Use mock data on error setOfficials([ { id: 1, name: "Priya Reddy", position: "MLA", party: "Indian National Congress", constituency: "Bangalore South", tenure: "2018–Present", score: 87, image: "https://api.dicebear.com/7.x/avataaars/svg?seed=Priya", approvals: 2847, disapprovals: 423, promises: 24, completed: 18, inProgress: 4, broken: 2, lastUpdated: "2 hours ago", sources: { myneta: true, eci: true, twitter: true, news: 15, govt: 8 }, discussions: 156 }, { id: 2, name: "Anil Kumar", position: "Mayor", party: "BJP", constituency: "BBMP Ward 42", tenure: "2020–Present", score: 68, image: "https://api.dicebear.com/7.x/avataaars/svg?seed=Anil", approvals: 1823, disapprovals: 891, promises: 18, completed: 10, inProgress: 5, broken: 3, lastUpdated: "1 day ago", sources: { myneta: true, eci: true, twitter: true, news: 12, govt: 6 }, discussions: 89 }, { id: 3, name: "Meena Raj", position: "Urban Development Minister", party: "JD(S)", constituency: "Bangalore Central", tenure: "2019–Present", score: 82, image: "https://api.dicebear.com/7.x/avataaars/svg?seed=Meena", approvals: 3201, disapprovals: 567, promises: 31, completed: 22, inProgress: 7, broken: 2, lastUpdated: "5 hours ago", sources: { myneta: true, eci: true, twitter: true, news: 21, govt: 14 }, discussions: 203 } ]); } finally { setLoading(false); } }; const filteredOfficials = officials.filter(official => { const matchesSearch = official.name?.toLowerCase().includes(searchQuery.toLowerCase()) || official.constituency?.toLowerCase().includes(searchQuery.toLowerCase()) || official.party?.toLowerCase().includes(searchQuery.toLowerCase()); const matchesParty = filterParty === 'all' || official.party === filterParty; const matchesScore = filterScore === 'all' || (filterScore === '80plus' && official.score >= 80) || (filterScore === '60-80' && official.score >= 60 && official.score < 80) || (filterScore === 'below60' && official.score < 60); return matchesSearch && matchesParty && matchesScore; }); return (

Phase 1 — Profiles Foundation (Bangalore)

Aggregate verified public data (MyNeta, ECI, Twitter, news, govt sources) to build authoritative profiles of elected officials. The platform is a forum that lets users compare government vs elected officials, track promises, discuss issues, and measure performance over time.

Search & Filters

setSearchQuery(e.target.value)} />

Aggregation Controls

Trigger or schedule data aggregation from public sources

Region

Bangalore — city-level profiles and linked departments

{loading ? (

Loading officials...

) : filteredOfficials.length === 0 ? (

No officials found. Try adjusting your filters.

) : ( <>
{filteredOfficials.map((official) => (
navigate(`/profile/${official.id}`, { state: { official } })} style={{ cursor: 'pointer', transition: 'all 0.2s' }} onMouseEnter={(e) => e.currentTarget.style.transform = 'translateY(-4px)'} onMouseLeave={(e) => e.currentTarget.style.transform = 'translateY(0)'} >

{official.name}

{official.position} • {official.constituency}
{official.score}

Party: {official.party}

Tenure: {official.tenure}

{official.completed}
Done
{official.inProgress}
Progress
{official.broken}
Broken
Community
))}

Compare & Measure

Compare statements vs government records, media reports and constituency data.

Claims

Promises from speeches and posts

Evidence

Government records and media

Measure

Calculated progress and score

Activity Timeline

2025-10-20 — Priya Reddy tweeted about road repairs in Bangalore South (source: Twitter)
2025-10-15 — ECI published poll data for BBMP wards (source: ECI)
2025-10-10 — MyNeta affidavit updated (assets) (source: MyNeta)
)}
© 2025 Social Record Platform — Empowering Open Governance in Bangalore
); }; export default Homepage;
